articles.description: Here's what's hot on the eShop right now
articles.content: Nintendo has shared a list of the top 15 most-downloaded Switch eShop games of May 2020 in Europe, and Animal Crossing: New Horizons has been knocked off the top spot for the first time since launch.… [+1177 chars]
